content:
Seidenweber family

1 Jozef SEIDENWEBER                  c1760 (Sanvel)
 + Serka                             c1762 - 1831 #69 (Salomon)
  2x Salomon SEIDENWEBER             1778-83
    + Chana                          1783-85 - 1849 #540 (Chaim)
     3x Moyzes SEIDENWEBER           1811 #100b
     3o Keile SEIDENWEBER            1813 #94
     3o Chaja Rachel SEIDENWEBER     1816 - Nov 28, 1816 #18a
    + Hanna Cerke GNENDELS           1832 #267 - ?Jan 9, 1883 #8
             married uncle-niece
     3x Jozef SEIDENWEBER            Sep 2, 1855 #335 - Jun 7, 1872 #221
  2x Abraham SEIDENWEBER             1797 - Sep 26, 1798 Krakow
  2x Jacob SEIDENWEBER               Mar 26, 1798 Krakow
  2o Sara SEIDENWEBER                1800 - Jun 29, 1801 Krakow
  2o Rachel SEIDENWEBER              Mar 28, 1801 Krakow - Jul 16, 1879 #226
    * Abraham FLONDER                Apr 29, 1798 Krakow - 1822 #100
          married Jan 31, 1822 #15
    * Abraham GNENDEL                1800-01 - 1845 #396
        FAMILY LISTING
  2x son SEIDENWEBER                 Apr 7, 1801 Krakow
  2x Moses SEIDENWEBER               Jul 2, 1803 Krakow - Jul 31, 1803 Krakow
